plot: McCord's gang robs the stage carrying money to pay Indians for their land, and the notorious outlaw &"The Oklahoma Kid&" Jim Kincaid takes the money from McCord. McCord stakes a &"sooner&" claim on land which is to be used for a new town; in exchange for giving it up he gets control of gambling and saloons. When Kincaid's father runs for mayor, McCord incites a mob to lynch the old man whom McCord has already framed for murder..   Written by  Ed Stephan
title: El chico de Oklahoma
